title: 💬 Leave Your Feedback
description: At GlobeWay, we believe the best way to improve is by listening to you! 🎯 Your feedback is essential for us to continue improving and making the platform even more intuitive and complete.
shareOpinion: We want to know your opinion! You can share:
shareList: 🚀 Suggestions for new features or improvements.
🐞 Bugs or technical issues you encountered.
💡 Any other ideas that can make GlobeWay even better!
teamMessage: Our team carefully analyzes each feedback, and we always strive to implement the best suggestions to provide the best possible experience.
shareYourOpinionDescription: Leave your suggestion, criticism, or praise in the field below. Your voice makes all the difference!
thankYouMessage: ✅ Thank you for your feedback! We are always working to improve GlobeWay. 🚀
finalMessage: ✨ Your participation helps us make GlobeWay the best country exploration platform! Thank you for being part of this journey. 🌍💙
connectWithUsDescription: Have any questions or suggestions? Reach out to us via GitHub or email, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible!
